subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1892 is on the way
description_text:
Hi I was wondering if you can help me I purchased simsonn x pro ultras with haptics the delivery was quick until it got to Great Britain it stuck at castle donnington GB it's been there since the fourth  it was supposed to be delivered to me on the 4th so could you look into it for me to find out the reason why it's stuck there. It says it will let me know when the delivery date but it's been like that since the fourth. I research on the place is only got a one-star rating
________________________________

Sent: 01 July 2025 11:29

conversations.body_text:
I just received update from ups now saying it's going to be delivered on Monday 7th. I will let you know if I don't receive it thanks you for excellent service your sincerely Dean ?
________________________________
Hi dean bustin,  Alright! If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at any time — we’re here to help.

Hi I've been waiting for the delivery for my sim racing pedals and now it's stuck at my castle dongington GB from the 4th of this month and it keeps saying I need to provide more information because it's missing and that if I don't the parcel will get delayed it's asking to fill out invoice and other missing information but I thought there  supposed to contact you about this not me. because I haven't got any invoice but the weird thing is the ups app says they're waiting for the information to  clear customs then 20 minutes later they're saying they've lost the information then after that I get some message 30 minutes later saying it's cleared customs and it's on its way so I don't know what it's going on I received my Simsonn active feedback motors form royal mail this afternoon I thought the pedals and active feedback motors  were  coming from ups together  could you please find out what's going on I'm so confused and I don't no what to do look forward to hearing back from you your sincerely Dean
________________________________

Hi dean bustin,     Your order was indeed split into two packages and I noticed that both packages were signed for, have you received them both? https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045795607140  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/sc/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3187083394965

Hi thank you for your response yes I just receive  parcels I just don't understand how it was stuck in my country since the fourth and they kept telling me that I was a business I had to fill out paperwork that was lost  so something went wrong at their end  and I just like to say excellent service I will definitely buy from you again I will recommend you to my friends your sincerely Dean ???
________________________________
Hi dean bustin,     Glad to hear the good news.  Feel free to contact me if you have any questions. Have fun bro!
